parameters.name: CasterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the production studio.

If you create a production studio through the [CreateCaster](~~69338#doc-api-live-CreateCaster~~ "Creates a production studio.") interface, check the value of the CasterId parameter in the response.

> The production studio must fulfill the following requirements when it was created:
*   **NormType**:**3** which means the video carousel mode.
*   **CasterTemplate**: lp_noTranscode.
*   **channelEnable**: 0.
*   **programEffect**: 1.

parameters.name: ProgramConfig
parameters.description: The configurations of the episode. If you add the episode to the streaming panel for the first time, this parameter is required to pass in the initial configurations. For more information, see the **ProgramConfig** section of this topic.

parameters.name: ProgramId
parameters.description: The ID of the episode list to which you want to add the episodes. If you do not set this parameter, an episode list is created by default.

parameters.name: ProgramItems
parameters.description: The episodes that you want to add to the production studio. The value is a JSON string. For more information, see the **InputProgramItem** section of this topic.
